dataset_id: BOREAS TE-01 Soils Data over the SSA Tower Sites in Raster Format
title: BOREAS TE-01 Soils Data over the SSA Tower Sites in Raster Format
summary: Gridded from vector layers of soil maps that were received from Dr. Darwin Anderson TE-01, who did the original soil mapping in the field during 1994. The vector layers were gridded into raster files that cover approximately 1 square kilometer over each of the SSA tower sites.
